ygData.subject: Re: Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Based on the conversations we ve had in the past, does anyone know if any changes are going to take place? Even if spells don t change, the one thing I liked
ygData.messageBody:
Based on the conversations we've had in the past, does anyone know if any
changes are going to take place?

Even if spells don't change, the one thing I liked about some of the
proposed changes was to give humans and de's "kick"

One thing about "hide" which DE's are born with. If you're a rogue, it
tells you if you suceed or not, but as an SK it doesn't tell me if it worked
or not (unless I do cons (only way I can verify)).

Was this a bug or oversight?

And a question for Brian, if you still read this. A few patches ago, they
said they implimented something to see your skills and max skill level, but
that function never worked. Any word on this?

Xaera.
